title: Question about the name of a design
content:
anybody knows what is this work by David Carson called?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [carson\_\_david\_bw.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017112247/http:/typophile.com/files/carson__david_bw.jpg) | 48.87 KB |
author: shivat

comments.content: I believe the official title is _Dogs Breakfast no. 9._

Si,

I would have said Dog’s Dinner, but close enough…
A common mistake, his Dogs Breakfast series predates his Dog's Dinner period, although few are aware of the differences.
